whyshopwithus.officialwebsite: The largest online selection of official Samsonite products including luggage, backpacks, bags and travel accessories.
whyshopwithus.securityShop: Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption makes every transaction safe and reliable.
whyshopwithus.fastdelivery: Online orders are delivered within 5 working days using a premium courier service.
whyshopwithus.fullcollection: One-stop shop for exploring the complete Samsonite collection online.
whyshopwithus.gift: 公式サイトでは大切な方への贈り物にギフトラッピングを承っています。
whyshopwithus.warranty: 公式サイトからお求めいただいた製品には、サムソナイトの保証規定が適用されます。
